com.skobbler.ngx.map

Class SKCoordinateRegion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skobbler.ngx.map.SKCoordinateRegion

  • public class SKCoordinateRegion
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that stores information about a map region ( map center and zoom level).
    Version:
    2.5

    • Constructor Summary
